location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map accompanying MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part I.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 326 x 407mm, on sheet 421 x 458mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part I. The map shows a region of southern and eastern Persia, indicating regions, cities, towns, roads, tracks, the routes of railways and telegraph lines, boundaries and hydrology.The map bears a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office. No. 3256, March 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
